page.title: 07BLACKO SCHOOL CHRISTMAS (2)
page.content: ......We set off around the village singing carols accompanied by two children playing the recorder and flute. We collected money to send to Cancer Research and another Christmas Collection at our concert was sent to help the Ethiopian Famine Appeal. Father Christmas came to the infant's party - he gave presents to everyone and we all gathered round the Christmas Tree to sing 'Away in a Manger.'It has been a lovely Christmas in school this year seeing everyone excited and a happy sparkle in people's eyes. Christmas at home is a happy time for all the family.Typical presents for children this year include home computers, B.M.X. Bicycles, electronic toys etc. - Very different from 100 years ago when children were given an orange and a small sum of money.................
